useCase.name: Retrieve Average Lending Duration Per Book

mainSequence.step: Librarian initiates GET request to retrieve average lending duration per book.
Lending Controller forwards request to Lending Service.
Lending Service processes request by fetching average lending duration per book.
Lending Service calls Lending Repository to find the average lending duration.
Lending Service maps and converts the results into Lending Avg Per Book Views.
Lending Controller receives and sends back the list of Lending Avg Per Book Views to Librarian.
